diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Bioinformatics.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    Bioinformatics[Bioinformatics] --> Data[Data Management]
    Bioinformatics --> Analysis[Sequence Analysis]
    Bioinformatics --> Modeling[Biomolecular Modeling]
    Data --> Genomics[Genomics Data]
    Data --> Proteomics[Proteomics Data]
    Analysis --> Alignment[Sequence Alignment]
    Analysis --> Phylogenetics[Phylogenetic Analysis]
    Modeling --> Structure[Protein Structure Prediction]
    Modeling --> Drug[Drug Design]
